name: Stay in nature, live up the fun!
description: From this trip, traveler can experience through the fun in the natural beauty of Langkawi island. From beach sport until city life, from history discovering until natural exploration, from food tasting till SPA relaxation, each of the activities can be enjoyed fully. This trip can bring traveler walk through the island uniqueness and appreciate each moment in fruitful way. You can taste the nice food, you can understand the history, you can enjoy the fun ride, you also can enjoy the beach games, and at the final part, you may either do some relax meditation and listen to natural call, or even get unique local groceries or shop till you drop in this duty free island.
